title: Mars Transit in the 6th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits the 6th house for Capricorn Ascendant, energy is directed toward work, discipline, competition, and problem-solving. You feel driven to overcome obstacles, assert authority in daily routines, and tackle challenges head-on. This phase strengthens fighting spirit against rivals, debts, or inefficiencies. However, impatience can trigger conflicts at the workplace or health strain if stress is unmanaged. Progress comes by channeling Marsâ€™ force into structured effort, disciplined habits, and calm strategy rather than confrontation.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Desire to correct flaws and inefficiencies

sections.title: Relationships
points: Need for patience in daily interactions

closing: This Mars transit gives Capricorn Ascendants strength to defeat obstacles. Discipline and patience turn struggle into steady victory.
